title: Electricity Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Electricity sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/94bAGJ5Ivi4


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Electric_01_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Electric_02_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Electric_03_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Electric_04_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Electric_05_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Electric_06_#[512,288].png 2048x1382

● Electric_07_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Electric_08_#[512,288].png 2048x1536

● Electric_09_#[512,288].png 2048x1536

● Electric_10_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Electric_11_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Electric_12_#[512,288].png 2048x1382


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
